channel.title: Will this be an issue?
channel.description:
Was talking to this guy on MSN and this is chat
This guy says www................com/?email=thisguy@hotmail.com Well check it out if you ever change your minf mind Lol, you use google chrome? I'm glad. 66.123.1231.23 Just testing out something
I changed ip and the url. He got my IP adress and knows what browser I used. Should I be scared? or is that all he can get.

item.title: Will this be an issue?
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

K thats enough. Lol I understand now its not a issue thank you all KISSES ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Will this be an issue?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

If you visited the website, it probably just logs your navigator details. It might be a website he has access to.

As always, don’t visit sites you don’t trust.

Read full topic

item.title: Will this be an issue?
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:1, topic:422454”]Was talking to this guy on MSN and this is chat

[quote]This guy says
www…com/?email=thisguy@hotmail.com
Well
check it out if you ever change your minf
mind
Lol, you use google chrome?
I’m glad.
66.123.1231.23
Just testing out something
[/quote]
I changed ip and the url.

He got my IP adress and knows what browser I used. Should I be scared? or is that all he can get.[/quote]First of all, and IP adress is just a name. He can’t do shit with it. Every website you visit has your IP. If you open a RSPS, you give people YOUR IP. As long as there is no server running, meaning that you’re not accepting incoming connections, noone can do shit to you. However a RAT could open a server on your PC but you’d have to download and execute the RAT before that happens.

[quote=“baddy351, post:3, topic:422454”]No, all the guy could possibly do is ddos you. Even with that, still not a huge security risk. No one can do much with an ip these days lol.[/quote]HAHAHAHh you’re funny, of course he can’t DDOS you. You need a server first for that to happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Will this be an issue?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

baddy351:

No, not unless he hacks onto your computer, then you are screwed. (Remote connection maybe? Idk how someone would do that.)

If he could manage to get OP to download a file that contains code for a RAT to be dropped in random places, then he could do almost anything. I think you can do this with the picture sharing over MSN, but I could very highly be wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Will this be an issue?
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

No, not unless he hacks onto your computer, then you are screwed. (Remote connection maybe? Idk how someone would do that.)

item.title: Will this be an issue?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:6, topic:422454”][quote author=tinyscape link=topic=525123.msg3822681#msg3822681 date=1321915687]
Tell him to shove his keyboard down his throat and choke.
[/quote]

K I did, but will this be an issue? Like any Credit Card information or rs acc details?[/quote]

That’s a keylogger, not a ddos.

Read full topic
